body:
It's not about the dataZoom component. Please see the data area. In your patch, the data that is not in the `min-max` range is not visible anymore and not connected to the adjacent data, which is not correct. The fix of this issue should not change the grid area, but only the dataZoom component.
I think this may not be the correct place to change.

I thought it solved your problem so I added `waiting-for-author` tag, waiting for you to close or I will close it after a week if the author did not respond. I think `symbolOffset` is the correct way to do this, since it's designed to adjust the position of symbols. If you use SVG to render the graph, you will see the position of the edge is actually much inside the nodes and it's not a problem with symbols on the edges. Actually, the start and end position calculation is quite complex. You can think they lie on an arc, not considering the shape of the nodes. Because if we wish to make the edge start and end exactly on the border of the node shape, it would be a super complex way to calculate (think about collision detection algorithm). So, I think it is a good idea to keep it this way, and use `symbolOffset` to adjust as you wish.
@Ovilia I see. Working on it.
如何将柱子设置在另一个系列啊？外观能看出不是在同一个系列吗？

这个PR的图没有问题，只是 geosjon 格式里，蓟洲区少了{"id":...,"type":"Feature",...，这个导致在其他工具里查看地图出现格式错误。

如果能加上 “type“: "Feature" 呢 之后合并的话，我会根据这个 geojson 做一个 js 文件，开另外一个 PR. 

----------

或者，就是合并我另外一个 PR，放弃这个。13 天了，作者还没有动静。

Hi! We've received your issue and please be patient to get responded. 🎉
The average response time is expected to be within one day for weekdays.

In the meanwhile, please make sure that **you have posted enough image to demo your request**. You may also check out the [API](http://echarts.apache.org/api.html) and [chart option](http://echarts.apache.org/option.html) to get the answer.

Have a nice day! 🍵

请提供可复现的例子。另外，我没有在[文档](https://github.com/apache/incubator-echarts/tree/master/extension/bmap)中找到 `styleJson` 相关的，请问是在哪里看到的？
Sorry, the website is under updating.

@Ovilia
同遇到这个问题，请问何时能修复啊？
It has been fixed now. Please visit https://echarts.apache.org/examples/en/index.html.
将原来系列中该数据的位置替换为 `'-'`，然后新建一个系列，其他只设为 `'-'`。样式自己相应调整即可。

The average response time is expected to be within one day for weekdays.

In the meanwhile, please make sure that **you have posted enough image to demo your request**. You may also check out the [API](http://echarts.apache.org/api.html) and [chart option](http://echarts.apache.org/option.html) to get the answer.

Have a nice day! 🍵

In your case, the `tooltip.trigger` is `'axis'` and it is based on x axis.
So there is only axis info in the `tooltip.formatter: function (params) { ... }` callback.
But when you travel the `params`, you can get the series info.
each series is either using the left y axis or using the right y axis,
then the y axis can be determined.
Noticing same thing despite setting a width to the closest parent / container.
Would really like to see the Chord type in Echarts 4.0 as well. Is that in the pipeline?

@Ovilia 我举得文档批准流程的例子实际上是一个State machine或者State flow的应用。我找了很多网上的资源，感觉用Echarts的Graph来实现这种State flow的应用还是不错的。如果能够实现我提出的这个定义Cursor话，那对我的应用几乎完美了。
如果Echarts可虑开发一个专门适用于State flow的图的话，那就更好了，比如加一些从一个state转移到另一个state的动画等。毕竟State flow有很广泛的应用，比如业务管理流程，控制系统策略等等。这里是一个State Machine的Javascript的库以供参考。

给你写了个例子 https://gallery.echartsjs.com/editor.html?c=xRug8P9KEm&v=1
ECharts 暂时不考虑流程图相关的，不然就是一系列很大的功能

@ZxdNoob ， 你可以顺手[做一个 js 文件](https://echarts-maps.github.io/echarts-geomapping-book-zh/howtos/add-ji-zhou-qu-to-tianjin/#js)吗？

```
$ npm install -g echarts-mapmaker
$ makejs tianjin.json tianjin.js 天津
```

I have a workaround to this that uses the custom chart type. Using this custom type, a bar chart style can be re-created and the in-built view clipping function used to ensure the chart doesn't exceed the chart area.

It is just a test currently and doesn't support horizontal bar styles or stacking but does partially resolve this annoying issue.

![chart-clipping](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/37954798/58751787-6e7d1800-849b-11e9-9453-bd269ddf928a.png)

> It's not about the dataZoom component. Please see the data area. In your patch, the data that is not in the `min-max` range is not visible anymore and not connected to the adjacent data, which is not correct. The fix of this issue should not change the grid area, but only the dataZoom component.
> I think this may not be the correct place to change.

@Ovilia This was cause by another bug, and it's in an opening issue, I can't find which it is. When you using toolbox to zoom in charts, it only considers those datas who are in view section.
you can also set datazoom without 'min' option, and then slide, you will see the line changing
https://github.com/apache/incubator-echarts/blob/master/src/component/dataZoom/AxisProxy.js#L303
zoom component controls valueWindow, and valueWindow controls view section, not quiet like no-datazoom situation.
